authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
description: The trio were spotted rubbing shoulders and enjoying some relaxation at the Blackmores Wellbeing Oasis, before Tim and Anna sat court side to watch a match.
title: Rachael Finch joins Tim Robards and Anna Heinrich at the Australian Open
title_page: Rachael Finch joins Tim Robards and Anna Heinrich at the Australian Open | Daily Mail Online
text:
Model and TV presenter Rachael Finch has spent time recently broadcasting from the Australian Open.
So she no doubt showed Bachelor couple Tim Robards and Anna Heinrich the ropes around the court, with the pair joining her down in Melbourne for the tennis event on Thursday.
The trio were spotted rubbing shoulders and enjoying some relaxation at the Blackmores Wellbeing Oasis, before Tim and Anna sat court side to watch a match.
Scroll down for video
Catching up: Rachael Finch (L) and Bachelor couple Tim Robards and Anna Heinrich enjoyed meeting up at the Blackmores Wellbeing Oasis at the Australian Open in Melbourne on Thursday
It seems all three personalities got the dress memo, all stepping out in white tops.
Rachael wore a polo T-shirt and three-quarter trousers, while Tim looked smart in jeans and a shirt.
Anna meanwhile wore black leather pants with her flowing strapless top, with a matching material choker.
See more of the latest news and updates from the 2016 Australian Open
Couples that dress alike! Both Tim and Anna wore white tops for the day and were colour coordinated
On duty: Rachael has been presenting from the Australian Open and on the day sported a polo T-shirt and three-quarter trousers with runners
Looking fresh, the trio enjoyed time with Blackmores where massages and refreshments were on offer.
Anna and Tim - who rose to fame on the reality dating show The Bachelor - appeared to be having fun as they mucked around with large tennis balls.
Tim at one point was seen with headphones on sitting as a masseuse worked on his shoulders, and he looked like he was meditating.
The duo - who are based in Sydney - also shared pictures online from the Oasis, with Anna captioning one picture 'having a ball.'
Fitness buff Tim also shared a picture online of himself lifting his girl into the air as she holds a weight, and looked to struggle lifting her.
Loving it: Anna and Tim - who rose to fame on the reality dating show The Bachelor - appeared to be having fun as they mucked around with large tennis balls
Keeping refreshed: Massages and refreshments were on offer at the Blackmores Oasis
All zen! Tim at one point was seen with headphones on sitting as a masseuse worked on his shoulders, and he looked like he was meditating
Sweet: The duo - who are based in Sydney - also shared pictures online from the Oasis, with Anna captioning one picture 'having a ball'
Working those muscles: Fitness buff Tim also shared a picture online of himself lifting his girl into the air as she holds a weight, and looked to struggle lifting her
Joining them in the Oasis was also a glowing Dr Joanna Mcmillan, who is a popular nutritionist and dietitian.
Dr Joanna showed off her trim figure in a printed play suit.
At one point of the day, she got into the spirit of tennis and happily walked around with a racket.
Familiar face: Joining them in the Oasis was also a glowing Dr Joanna McMillan, who is a popular nutritionist and dietitian
Girl time! Anna also met up with her sister Andrea Heinrich on the day
Tim, Anna and Dr Joanna were later spotted sitting in the crowd court side as they watched the showdown between American star player Serena Williams and polish player Agnieszka Radwanksa, which Serena won.
Tim and Anna however were seated apart, with Dr Joanna and another woman sitting between them.
Whether they were impressed or not about being separated, the pair put on happy faces and kept conversation going between the group.
For the match, Anna wore a black leather jacket to keep her bare shoulders warm.
The couple have previously expressed their excitement at heading to the Australian Open, with Tim recently writing online: 'Can't wait to get down to Melbs for the #AusOpen this week (sic),' in part of his post.
Ready to go! Tim, Anna and Dr Joanna were later spotted sitting in the crowd court side as they watched the showdown between American star player Serena Williams and polish player Agnieszka Radwanksa
Separated: Tim and Anna however spectated seats apart, with Dr Joanna and another woman sitting between them
Keeping amused: Tim and Dr Joanna chatted as they watched the match
